content: In 2020, which American singer-songwriter won Album of the Year at the Grammy Awards for her work on "folklore" while continuing her reign as a pop icon?

In 2020, the American singer-songwriter who won Album of the Year at the Grammy Awards for her work on "folklore" and continued her reign as a pop icon is Taylor Swift. "folklore" was a significant departure from her previous pop-oriented albums, featuring a more mature and introspective sound with collaborators such as Aaron Dessner of The National and Jack Antonoff. This album marked a new chapter in her career and received widespread critical acclaim, solidifying her status as one of the most influential artists in contemporary music.
